data.name: Waifu Discovered 2 - Exposed DLC
data.detailed_description:
This DLC, will unlock all unlockables for Waifu Discovered 2.
Notice that these have been created to be unlocked via gameplay. However we're aware not all players have the same level of skill or time to master the game. This DLC might save a few hours as you have access to everything. But it will not give any significant advantage over other players. So, keep in mind this DLC doesn't add any new contents.

What is exactly unlocking?

This is:

- Unlocks all waifu galleries (it will also display secret ones).
- Unlocks all cloth combinations.
- Unlocks all uncensor modes.
- Unlocks all player ships.
- Unlocks one hand mode.
- Makes sure you own at least 2 magic coins when starting a new game.
- By request, it adds beginner mode. It's slightly easier than Standard, which we already consider very playable. This mode doesn't add anything new to the game.

This is NOT an achievement unlocker, you still need to play to get the achievements.

data.short_description: This DLC, unlocks all hidden (or unlockable by playing) contents in "Waifu Discovered 2".
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64bits
  • Processor: Dual Core @ 2.4GHz (64bit)
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI 7540HD
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible.
  • Additional Notes: It might run in lowers specs.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains CARTOONISH nude content of adult women. Some scenes might contain integral nudes.

However, there is no actual sexual act, or sexual talk in the contents of the game.
